histogram-w-arrows.png.description: A histogram showing the distribution of ages for 10 cats, between the ages of 1 and 8. A star labeling the mean is drawn on the x-axis at 3, and  arrows show the distance between the mean and each point in the first interval.

histogram-w-mean.png.description: A histogram showing the distribution of ages for 10 cats, between the ages of 1 and 8. A star labeling the mean is drawn on the x-axis at 3.

histogram-with-outlier.png.description: A histogram showing the distribution of ages for 10 cats, between the ages of 1 and 8. An 11th cat has been added at 16 years.

stdev-cat-age.png.description: A histogram showing the distribution of ages for 10 cats, between the ages of 1 and 8, with 1-year intervals
